Question
========

A person achieves a score of 7.6 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 3 with a standard deviation 1.6. The z-score of the person with 7.6 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 2.74
* 2.87
* 4.29

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 2.74: Incorrect
* 2.87: Correct
* 4.29: Incorrect
